review: Amazon' Fire TV is incredible.  I have been a Prime member for 1-2 yrs and mostly buy regular books and Kindle books.  I am not big on watching TV despite having a monster sized big screen.  Prior to buying Fire TV, I just watched favorite movies or TV shows via Prime on my iMac.I bought Fire TV and now seriously enjoy the Prime selections of shows and music.  The Fire TV interface is intuitive and easily matches what I have available via the iMac or even my new Fire Kindle 7.Between Fire TV and Kindle Fire... I have not had such a wonderful electronics expereince and delight since I started using an Apple IIe the first time decades ago:)
author: Dave Walker

review: The device itself is easy to hook up and use.  But I wanted to still be able to watch my local stations for news, etc.  I haven't figured out if that is possible to do w/o disconnecting it every time which will be really inconvenient.
